credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
dimensions:
Overall sheet size with additions: 34.9 x 23.2 cm (13 3/4 x 9 1/8 in.)
Mat: 55.9 x 40.6 cm (22 x 16 in.)
Original Sheet size: 26.8 x 21.4 cm (10 9/16 x 8 7/16 in.)
title: Ruin Fantasy
provenance: From the collection of Leon Decloux
medium: Brush and black and gray wash, black chalk on cream laid paper
description: Statues and columns stand on the top of a city fountain in front of a ruined classical building. A colonade is visible in the background and in the left foreground, a overturned barrel is visible in the shadows. The sheet has additions at top and bottom, and along the left and right sides.
name: Drawing
